pageContext.claim: “Our market is way up. We've picked up, since my election, trillions of dollars of worth. Trillions.”
pageContext.analysis: This appears to be based on the performance of the Russell 3000 Index since Trump’s inauguration. This index includes nearly 98 percent of U.S. stocks, but the market capitalization of the top U.S. companies is not a good indicator of wealth gains for the general population. The stock market has been mostly flat for the last year.
